articles.title: Statement by Minister of Foreign Affairs on China human rights dialogue
articles.body: The Minister of Foreign Affairs issued a statement regarding Canada's ongoing engagement with China on human rights issues, including the treatment of Uyghur minorities in Xinjiang and the situation in Hong Kong.

articles.title: Canada updates travel advisory for China
articles.body: Global Affairs Canada has updated the travel advisory for the People's Republic of China. Canadians are advised to exercise a high degree of caution due to the risk of arbitrary enforcement of local laws.

articles.title: Press release: Canada-EU joint statement on Indo-Pacific engagement
articles.body: Canada and the European Union issued a joint press release affirming their shared commitment to a free and open Indo-Pacific region, with specific references to maintaining stability in the Taiwan Strait.

articles.title: Canada announces development aid package for Southeast Asia
articles.body: The Government of Canada announced a $200 million development assistance package for Southeast Asian nations focused on climate resilience and democratic governance.

articles.title: Minister participates in Arctic Council ministerial meeting
articles.body: Canada's Minister of Foreign Affairs participated in the Arctic Council ministerial meeting discussing environmental protection and indigenous community engagement in the Arctic region.
